short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional issue timing functionality to Gitlab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows users to do the following
- Time specific issues in Gitlab
- Generate a daily time summary for each project in Gitlab
- Paste daily times into timesheet

Pasting into the timesheet requires the user to grant special permissions for the site to access your clipboard. You will only need to hit the prompt once then the permission will be stored in your Chrome profile.

Please see the demo video to see how to use each feature and allow clipboard access
